Name: 3MC syndrome 1
Definition: A 3MC syndrome that has_material_basis_in autosomal recessive inheritance of homozygous mutation in the mannan binding lectin serine peptidase 1 gene (MASP1) on chromosome 3q27.

Name: 3MC syndrome 2
Definition: A 3MC syndrome that has_material_basis_in autosomal recessive inheritance of homozygous mutation in the collectin subfamily member 11 gene (COLEC11) on chromosome 2p25.

Name: 3MC syndrome 3
Definition: A 3MC syndrome that has_material_basis_in a compound heterozygous mutation in the COLEC10 gene on chromosome 8q24.
